name: model-selector
title: Model Selector
author: SikandarJODD
description: A searchable command palette for selecting AI models with provider logos and multi-provider support.

files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import * as Dialog from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/dialog/index.js";
	import type { Dialog as DialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		open = $bindable(false),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<DialogPrimitive.RootProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Dialog.Root bind:open {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Dialog.Root>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Dialog from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/dialog/index.js";
	import type { Dialog as DialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<DialogPrimitive.TriggerProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Dialog.Trigger bind:ref {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Dialog.Trigger>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Dialog from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/dialog/index.js";
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Dialog as DialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		class: className,
		children,
		portalProps,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<DialogPrimitive.ContentProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
		portalProps?: DialogPrimitive.PortalProps;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Dialog.Content bind:ref class={cn("p-0", className)} {portalProps} {...restProps}>
	<Command.Root class="**:data-[slot=command-input-wrapper]:h-auto">
		{@render children()}
	</Command.Root>
</Dialog.Content>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive, Dialog as DialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		open = $bindable(false),
		ref = $bindable(null),
		value = $bindable(""),
		title = "Model Selector",
		description = "Search for a model",
		portalProps,
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<DialogPrimitive.RootProps> &
		WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.RootProps> & {
			portalProps?: DialogPrimitive.PortalProps;
			children: Snippet;
			title?: string;
			description?: string;
		} = $props();
</script>

<Command.Dialog bind:open bind:ref bind:value {title} {description} {portalProps} {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Command.Dialog>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		class: className,
		value = $bindable(""),
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.InputProps> = $props();
</script>

<Command.Input bind:ref bind:value class={cn("h-auto py-3.5", className)} {...restProps} />

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.ListProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Command.List bind:ref {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Command.List>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.EmptyProps> & {
		children?: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Command.Empty bind:ref {...restProps}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</Command.Empty>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		heading,
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.GroupProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
		heading?: string;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Command.Group bind:ref {heading} {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Command.Group>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.ItemProps> & {
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Command.Item bind:ref {...restProps}>
	{@render children()}
</Command.Item>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { WithElementRef } from "$UTILS$.js";
	import type { HTMLAttributes } from "svelte/elements";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		children,
		...restProps
	}: WithElementRef<HTMLAttributes<HTMLSpanElement>> = $props();
</script>

<Command.Shortcut bind:ref {...restProps}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</Command.Shortcut>

<script lang="ts">
	import * as Command from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/command/index.js";
	import type { Command as CommandPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { WithoutChildrenOrChild } from "$UTILS$.js";

	let {
		ref = $bindable(null),
		...restProps
	}: WithoutChildrenOrChild<CommandPrimitive.SeparatorProps> = $props();
</script>

<Command.Separator bind:ref {...restProps} />
img]:bg-background [&>img]:ring-border flex shrink-0 items-center -space-x-1 [&>img]:rounded-full [&>img]:p-px [&>img]:ring-1", className )} {...restProps} > {@render children()}
{@render children()}
